prompt: Create a cute orange cat vector illustration in svg - return only the svg
svg:
<svg width="200" height="200" viewBox="0 0 200 200" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Round, stocky body -->
  <circle cx="100" cy="135" r="48" fill="#8c9ba8"/>

  <!-- Round head (chubby cheeks) -->
  <circle cx="100" cy="75" r="36" fill="#8c9ba8"/>

  <!-- Chubby cheeks -->
  <circle cx="75" cy="82" r="16" fill="#8c9ba8"/>
  <circle cx="125" cy="82" r="16" fill="#8c9ba8"/>

  <!-- Small rounded ears -->
  <ellipse cx="75" cy="50" rx="14" ry="12" fill="#8c9ba8" transform="rotate(-15 75 50)"/>
  <ellipse cx="125" cy="50" rx="14" ry="12" fill="#8c9ba8" transform="rotate(15 125 50)"/>
  <ellipse cx="75" cy="52" rx="8" ry="7" fill="#9dacb9" transform="rotate(-15 75 52)"/>
  <ellipse cx="125" cy="52" rx="8" ry="7" fill="#9dacb9" transform="rotate(15 125 52)"/>

  <!-- Large round eyes (copper/orange) -->
  <circle cx="88" cy="75" r="10" fill="#ff8e00"/>
  <circle cx="112" cy="75" r="10" fill="#ff8e00"/>
  <circle cx="88" cy="75" r="5" fill="#000"/>
  <circle cx="112" cy="75" r="5" fill="#000"/>
  <circle cx="89" cy="73" r="2.5" fill="#fff"/>
  <circle cx="113" cy="73" r="2.5" fill="#fff"/>

  <!-- Small nose -->
  <ellipse cx="100" cy="88" rx="5" ry="4" fill="#7b8aa8"/>

  <!-- Smiling mouth -->
  <path d="M 100 88 Q 95 92 92 90" stroke="#5566aa" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none"/>
  <path d="M 100 88 Q 105 92 108 90" stroke="#5566aa" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none"/>

  <!-- Whiskers -->
  <line x1="62" y1="80" x2="78" y2="79" stroke="#556677" stroke-width="1"/>
  <line x1="62" y1="85" x2="78" y2="83" stroke="#556677" stroke-width="1"/>
  <line x1="138" y1="80" x2="122" y2="79" stroke="#556677" stroke-width="1"/>
  <line x1="138" y1="85" x2="122" y2="83" stroke="#556677" stroke-width="1"/>

  <!-- Short sturdy legs -->
  <ellipse cx="82" cy="178" rx="12" ry="15" fill="#8c9ba8"/>
  <ellipse cx="118" cy="178" rx="12" ry="15" fill="#8c9ba8"/>

  <!-- Short thick tail -->
  <path d="M 142 135 Q 162 130 172 120" stroke="#8899aa" stroke-width="18" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round"/>
</svg>

prompt: Build an svg showing a orange dog - return only svg
svg:
<svg width="200" height="200" viewBox="0 0 200 200" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Body -->
  <ellipse cx="100" cy="125" rx="42" ry="44" fill="#d77b39"/>

  <!-- White/cream chest and belly -->
  <ellipse cx="100" cy="135" rx="30" ry="32" fill="#f8e7d2"/>

  <!-- Head -->
  <circle cx="100" cy="75" r="32" fill="#d77b39"/>

  <!-- White cheeks -->
  <ellipse cx="85" cy="82" rx="12" ry="15" fill="#f8e7d2"/>
  <ellipse cx="115" cy="82" rx="12" ry="15" fill="#f8e7d2"/>

  <!-- White muzzle -->
  <ellipse cx="100" cy="88" rx="16" ry="12" fill="#f8e7d2"/>

  <!-- Pointed ears -->
  <path d="M 78 58 L 72 35 L 85 55 Z" fill="#d77b39"/>
  <path d="M 122 58 L 128 35 L 115 55 Z" fill="#d77b39"/>
  <path d="M 79 56 L 75 42 L 83 56 Z" fill="#f8d6a7"/>
  <path d="M 121 56 L 125 42 L 117 56 Z" fill="#f8d6a7"/>

  <!-- Eyes (slightly squinting, happy) -->
  <ellipse cx="90" cy="72" rx="4" ry="5" fill="#333"/>
  <ellipse cx="110" cy="72" rx="4" ry="5" fill="#333"/>
  <circle cx="91" cy="70" r="1.5" fill="#fff"/>
  <circle cx="111" cy="70" r="1.5" fill="#fff"/>

  <!-- Nose -->
  <circle cx="100" cy="90" r="5" fill="#333"/>

  <!-- Smiling mouth -->
  <path d="M 100 90 Q 94 95 90 93" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2" fill="none"/>
  <path d="M 100 90 Q 106 95 110 93" stroke="#333" stroke-width="2" fill="none"/>

  <!-- Legs with white socks -->
  <rect x="76" y="155" width="12" height="30" rx="6" fill="#d77b39"/>
  <rect x="112" y="155" width="12" height="30" rx="6" fill="#d77b39"/>
  <rect x="76" y="172" width="12" height="13" rx="6" fill="#f8e7d2"/>
  <rect x="112" y="172" width="12" height="13" rx="6" fill="#f8e7d2"/>

  <!-- Curled tail -->
  <path d="M 138 115 Q 158 105 165 95 Q 168 88 165 82" stroke="#d47a3a" stroke-width="14" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round"/>
  <path d="M 140 113 Q 157 108 162 98" stroke="#f5d5a8" stroke-width="6" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round"/>
</svg>

prompt: Produce an svg of a light gray cat with blue eyes and pink nose - provide only the svg
svg:
<svg width="200" height="200" viewBox="0 0 200 200" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Body -->
  <ellipse cx="100" cy="130" rx="45" ry="40" fill="#e8e8e8"/>

  <!-- Head -->
  <circle cx="100" cy="80" r="35" fill="#e8e8e8"/>

  <!-- Pointed ears -->
  <path d="M 75 55 L 65 30 L 82 50 Z" fill="#e8e8e8"/>
  <path d="M 125 55 L 135 30 L 118 50 Z" fill="#e8e8e8"/>
  <path d="M 77 52 L 70 38 L 80 50 Z" fill="#ffc0cb"/>
  <path d="M 123 52 L 130 38 L 120 50 Z" fill="#ffc0cb"/>

  <!-- Eyes (blue) -->
  <ellipse cx="88" cy="78" rx="8" ry="10" fill="#4da6ff"/>
  <ellipse cx="112" cy="78" rx="8" ry="10" fill="#4da6ff"/>
  <ellipse cx="88" cy="78" rx="2" ry="8" fill="#000"/>
  <ellipse cx="112" cy="78" rx="2" ry="8" fill="#000"/>

  <!-- Nose -->
  <path d="M 100 90 L 95 95 L 100 93 L 105 95 Z" fill="#ffb3d9"/>

  <!-- Mouth -->
  <path d="M 100 93 Q 95 98 92 96" stroke="#c8c8c8" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none"/>
  <path d="M 100 93 Q 105 98 108 96" stroke="#c8c8c8" stroke-width="1.5" fill="none"/>

  <!-- Whiskers -->
  <line x1="65" y1="85" x2="85" y2="84" stroke="#c8c8c8" stroke-width="1"/>
  <line x1="65" y1="90" x2="85" y2="88" stroke="#c8c8c8" stroke-width="1"/>
  <line x1="135" y1="85" x2="115" y2="84" stroke="#c8c8c8" stroke-width="1"/>
  <line x1="135" y1="90" x2="115" y2="88" stroke="#c8c8c8" stroke-width="1"/>

  <!-- Front paws -->
  <ellipse cx="85" cy="165" rx="10" ry="15" fill="#e8e8e8"/>
  <ellipse cx="115" cy="165" rx="10" ry="15" fill="#e8e8e8"/>

  <!-- Tail (fluffy) -->
  <path d="M 140 130 Q 165 120 175 110" stroke="#e8e8e8" stroke-width="18" fill="none" stroke-linecap="round"/>
</svg>
